channel.title: Segment on The Best Landing Page Inspiration | Lapa.Ninja
channel.description: Recent content in Segment on The Best Landing Page Inspiration

description.p: Segment is trusted by thousands of companies as their Customer Data Platform. Collect user data with one API and send it to hundreds of tools or a data warehouse.
Segment is one place to collect customer data and send it to your tools for analytics, marketing automation, and raw data access with SQL.
